description: Browse our selection of outdoor chairs and stools, ideal for any café or restaurant with outdoor seating areas.  From comfortable rattan seating to practical aluminium stacking chairs, we have a comprehensive choice of styles for outdoor seating, including practical easy clean outdoor chairs.  Many available in stock for quick delivery. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Outdoor Chairs & Stools
